name: epistemological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the part of philosophy that is about the study of how we know things: The plot of the film is an epistemological inquiry. Epistemological skills can be more important than technical skills. See
epistemology
More examplesFewer examplesThe entire project was left in an epistemological limbo.He is not just a psychological puzzle but an epistemological one.Epistemological problems can make it difficult to articulate professional knowledge to other people.
